body.p:
282
May 10th 4
J. N. B. Hardwick Esq
George Knox "
J. H. Scholl "
G. M. Pettit "
Stanton Ky:
Gentlemen

Your communication of the 1s inst addressed to his Excellency Governor Bramlette, has been referred to me for reply. I have the honor to state that your letter has been referred to Brig Genl Burbridge who has entire jurisdiction in the matter, and who will doubtless give protection as far as he is able, to the loyal people of your county.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
